probabilityCalculationFormula: P(label) = (Frequency of label * Weight) / (Total frequency of all labels * Weight)

probabilityCalculationParameters.Frequency of label: Number of times the label appears in the transaction summary
probabilityCalculationParameters.Total frequency of all labels: Total number of labels present in the transaction summary
probabilityCalculationParameters.Weight: A value that adjusts the importance of each label (0-1 scale, e.g., 0.5 for a moderately important label)
